Still causing interplanetary troubles, eh? Very well, enjoy your consolation. 8570 isoton yield, fully autonomous, and heading your way right now. Have fun...

\*Launches TCAW\* [Transwarp Capable Antimatter Warhead]
I jam the sugnal causing it to blow up the crater my crater within a crater

The nature of it's Bio-neural circuitry gives it a sense of self-preservation, superseded only by the sense of reaching it's intended target along with the confirmation codes.

It's sense to protect it's own existence makes it burn out it's own arming system. It's onboard mind and comm network allow it to communicate with the others, and tells another one of them to take it's place, giving coordinates, confirmation codes, and adaptable configuration settings to use in case of another disruption.

It was clear that you were dangerous from the start, and I should have expected no less. However, the technology to fool one of my missiles is beyond even me. 

Still fancy your chances? You have roughly .85 seconds to answer.

I find a trash can to hide in while you shoot each-other with sci-fi.

My trash can.

I burn all books and movies and offline/online servers that contain scifi, and launch the trashcan.

my crater.

Play by the rules or don't play.

Very Well. Multiverse has been reset.
